feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 6:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 8.4°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1 except minus 2 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy except freezing rain over higher terrain overnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 1 except minus 2 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 3 except zero over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except freezing rain over higher terrain. Amount 5 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3 except zero over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands late in the evening. Amount 5 mm except 15 mm in the heaviest showers. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
